description.zh-cn: 位于东南亚的联邦制、议会民主制、选举君主制和君主立宪制国家。由前马来亚联合邦、北婆罗洲、砂拉越及新加坡于1963年9月16日所组成。
description.en: A federal parliamentary elective constitutional monarchy located in Southeast Asia. It was formed on 16 September 1963 by the merger of the existing Federation of Malaya, North Borneo, Sarawak, and Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 1948年至1963年间存在的联邦，于1957年8月31日从英国独立，是马来西亚的前身。
description.en: A federation that existed from 1948 to 1963. It gained independence from the United Kingdom on 31 August 1957 and was the predecessor to Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚的岛国及城市国家。曾于1963年至1965年加入马来西亚联邦。
description.en: An island city-state in Southeast Asia. It was a state of Malaysia from 1963 to 1965.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个邦，位于婆罗洲北部。1963年作为创始成员加入马来西亚。
description.en: A state of Malaysia, located on the northern portion of Borneo. It joined Malaysia as a founding member in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个邦，位于婆罗洲北部，前身为北婆罗洲。1963年作为创始成员加入马来西亚。
description.en: A state of Malaysia located on the northern portion of Borneo, formerly known as North Borneo. It joined Malaysia as a founding member in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的国家立法机关。
description.en: The national legislature of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第一任首相，被尊称为马来西亚“国父”。
description.en: The first Prime Minister of Malaysia, revered as the "Father of Malaysia".

description.zh-cn: 历史上最大的帝国，马来亚、砂拉越、北婆罗洲曾是其殖民地。
description.en: The largest empire in history, of which Malaya, Sarawak, and North Borneo were colonies.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家。在第二次世界大战期间曾占领马来亚。
description.en: An East Asian country. Occupied Malaya during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的战争，期间日本占领了马来亚。
description.en: A global war during which Japan occupied Malaya.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚国家，马来西亚的邻国。在马来西亚成立初期曾因领土问题发生冲突。
description.en: A Southeast Asian country neighboring Malaysia. It had conflicts with Malaysia over territorial issues during the latter's early years.

description.zh-cn: 印度尼西亚第一任总统，曾反对马来西亚的成立。
description.en: The first President of Indonesia, who opposed the formation of Malaysia.

zh-cn: 印度尼西亚－马来西亚冲突

description.zh-cn: 印度尼西亚因反对马来西亚成立而引发的一场未宣战的武装冲突。
description.en: An undeclared armed conflict between Indonesia and Malaysia stemming from Indonesia's opposition to the formation of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 1969年马来西亚大选后在首都吉隆坡爆发的严重种族冲突事件。
description.en: A serious racial riot that broke out in Kuala Lumpur after the 1969 Malaysian general election.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第二任首相，在五一三事件后推行新经济政策。
description.en: The second Prime Minister of Malaysia, who implemented the New Economic Policy after the 13 May incident.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政府于1971年推行的一项社会经济重组政策，旨在通过配额制提高土著的经济权益。
description.en: A socio-economic restructuring policy implemented by the Malaysian government in 1971, aimed at increasing the economic equity of the Bumiputera through a quota system.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个政党联盟，自成立以来长期执政，直至2018年大选落败。
description.en: A political coalition in Malaysia that was the long-ruling coalition from its inception until its defeat in the 2018 general election.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第四任和第七任首相，被誉为“马来西亚现代化之父”。
description.en: The fourth and seventh Prime Minister of Malaysia, known as the "Father of Modern Malaysia".

description.zh-cn: 1997年爆发的一场波及亚洲多国的金融风暴，对马来西亚经济造成严重冲击。
description.en: A financial crisis that began in 1997, affecting many Asian countries and severely impacting Malaysia's economy.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第六任首相，其任内发生了一个马来西亚发展有限公司丑闻。
description.en: The sixth Prime Minister of Malaysia, during whose tenure the 1MDB scandal occurred.

nodes.id: 一个马来西亚有限公司丑闻

zh-cn: 一个马来西亚有限公司丑闻

description.zh-cn: 一宗涉及马来西亚主权财富基金一个马来西亚发展有限公司的大型贪腐、洗钱丑闻。
description.en: A major corruption and money laundering scandal involving the Malaysian sovereign wealth fund, 1Malaysia Development Berhad.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个政党联盟，在2018年大选中获胜，实现了马来西亚首次政党轮替。
description.en: A political coalition in Malaysia that won the 2018 general election, leading to the country's first-ever change in government.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第14届全国大选，导致了自独立以来首次的政党轮替。
description.en: The 14th Malaysian general election, which resulted in the first change of government since independence.

description.zh-cn: 一场导致希望联盟政府倒台的政治危机。
description.en: A political crisis that led to the collapse of the Pakatan Harapan government.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第八任首相，在2020年政治危机后上台。
description.en: The eighth Prime Minister of Malaysia, who came to power after the 2020 political crisis.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第十任首相。
description.en: The tenth Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 现任马来西亚最高元首。
description.en: The current Yang di-Pertuan Agong (Supreme Head of State) of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，曾于1511年攻占马六甲，开启了欧洲在马来半岛的殖民统治。
description.en: A European country that captured Malacca in 1511, beginning European colonial rule in the Malay Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 位于马来半岛的一个伊斯兰苏丹国，被普遍认为是马来半岛的第一个独立国家。
description.en: An Islamic sultanate located on the Malay Peninsula, widely considered the first independent state on the peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，曾于1641年从葡萄牙手中夺取马六甲。
description.en: A European country that captured Malacca from the Portuguese in 1641.

description.zh-cn: 马来亚联合邦与北婆罗洲（沙巴）、砂拉越和新加坡共同组成了马来西亚联邦。
description.en: The Federation of Malaya, together with North Borneo (Sabah), Sarawak, and Singapore, formed the Federation of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 马来亚联合邦是英国的殖民地，直到1957年8月31日获得独立。
description.en: The Federation of Malaya was a British colony until it gained independence on August 31, 1957.

description.zh-cn: 1965年，马来西亚国会全数通过议案将新加坡逐出马来西亚联邦，导致新加坡独立。
description.en: In 1965, the Malaysian Parliament unanimously passed a bill to expel Singapore from the Federation of Malaysia, leading to Singapore's independence.

description.zh-cn: 东姑阿都拉曼是马来亚联合邦的第一任首相。
description.en: Tunku Abdul Rahman was the first Prime Minister of the Federation of Malaya.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚成立后，东姑阿都拉曼继续担任首相。
description.en: After the formation of Malaysia, Tunku Abdul Rahman continued to serve as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，日本发动了太平洋战争并占领了包括马来亚在内的东南亚地区。
description.en: During World War II, Japan launched the Pacific War and occupied Southeast Asia, including Malaya.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战期间，日本军队占领了英属马来亚，中断了英国的殖民统治。
description.en: During World War II, Japanese forces occupied British Malaya, interrupting British colonial rule.

description.zh-cn: 印度尼西亚总统苏卡诺反对马来西亚联邦的成立，并随后发起了马印对抗。
description.en: Indonesian President Sukarno opposed the formation of the Federation of Malaysia and subsequently initiated the Indonesia-Malaysia confrontation.

description.zh-cn: 因反对马来西亚成立，印度尼西亚与马来西亚爆发了为期三年的武装冲突，即“马印对抗”。
description.en: Due to its opposition to the formation of Malaysia, Indonesia engaged in a three-year armed conflict with Malaysia known as the "Konfrontasi".

description.zh-cn: 五一三事件后，时任副首相阿都拉萨领导的国家行动理事会掌权，并随后推行了新经济政策。
description.en: After the 13 May incident, the National Operations Council led by then-Deputy Prime Minister Abdul Razak took power, and he subsequently launched the New Economic Policy.

description.zh-cn: 阿都拉萨政府在五一三事件后开始推行新经济政策，以解决种族经济不平衡问题。
description.en: The Abdul Razak government implemented the New Economic Policy after the 13 May incident to address racial economic imbalances.

description.zh-cn: 马哈迪·莫哈末曾两度担任马来西亚首相。
description.en: Mahathir Mohamad served as the Prime Minister of Malaysia on two occasions.

description.zh-cn: 1997年的亚洲金融危机使马来西亚的经济和政局受到严重挫折。
description.en: The 1997 Asian financial crisis caused a severe setback to Malaysia's economy and political situation.

relationships.source: 一个马来西亚有限公司丑闻

description.zh-cn: 一个马来西亚有限公司丑闻曝光后，时任首相纳吉·阿都拉萨的声誉和政治生涯受到重创，并最终被定罪。
description.en: After the 1MDB scandal was exposed, the reputation and political career of then-Prime Minister Najib Razak were severely damaged, and he was eventually convicted.

description.zh-cn: 在2018年大选中，国民阵线败给希望联盟，结束了其自马来西亚独立以来长达61年的执政。
description.en: In the 2018 general election, Barisan Nasional was defeated by Pakatan Harapan, ending its 61-year rule since Malaysia's independence.

description.zh-cn: 希望联盟在2018年大选中取得胜利，首次实现马来西亚的政党轮替。
description.en: Pakatan Harapan's victory in the 2018 general election brought about Malaysia's first-ever change of government.

description.zh-cn: 2020年的政治危机导致希望联盟政府倒台。
description.en: The 2020 political crisis led to the collapse of the Pakatan Harapan government.

description.zh-cn: 在2020年政治危机后，慕尤丁出任马来西亚第八任首相。
description.en: Following the 2020 political crisis, Muhyiddin Yassin became the 8th Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 安华·依布拉欣是马来西亚现任首相。
description.en: Anwar Ibrahim is the current Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 苏丹依布拉欣·依斯迈是马来西亚现任最高元首。
description.en: Sultan Ibrahim Ismail is the current Yang di-Pertuan Agong of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 1511年，葡萄牙舰队攻占马六甲，导致马六甲苏丹王朝的终结。
description.en: In 1511, a Portuguese fleet captured Malacca, leading to the fall of the Malacca Sultanate.

description.zh-cn: 1641年，荷兰联合柔佛攻下马六甲，结束了葡萄牙对该地的统治。
description.en: In 1641, the Dutch, in alliance with Johor, captured Malacca, ending Portuguese rule over the territory.
